description: Buyer says an item has not arrived and also asks for a partial refund (e.g., shipping or partial compensation).
example_user_utterances: My package never arrived and I only want part of the payment refunded because the seller sent a replacement.
The item didn’t show up on time, can we do a partial refund for the shipping and I’ll wait a bit longer?

description: Buyer explains that the item is not as described and explicitly asks for a full refund.
example_user_utterances: The shoes I received look nothing like the listing and I want a full refund.
This item is completely different from what was advertised, please refund the full amount.

description: User was charged unexpectedly for a subscription and also wants to cancel future recurring payments.
example_user_utterances: I was just charged again for Netflix without my permission and I want to cancel the subscription going forward.
There’s an unexpected recurring charge from this app and I need to stop all future payments.

description: User sees an unauthorized payment and is now locked out of the account.
example_user_utterances: I see an unauthorized charge and now I can’t even log in to my account.
Someone hacked my account, made a payment, and now I’m locked out.

description: User has trouble verifying a bank and also has a delayed withdrawal to that bank.
example_user_utterances: My bank won’t verify properly and the withdrawal to that same bank is still pending.
I can’t finish linking my bank and the transfer I started to it is stuck.

description: User’s new card can’t be added and a transfer to their bank is also failing.
example_user_utterances: PayPal won’t let me add my Wells Fargo card and my transfer to that bank is also failing.
My new card can’t be added and I keep getting an error when I try to move money to my bank.

description: User requests a higher Pay Later limit because a Pay Later purchase was declined.
example_user_utterances: My Pay Later was just declined for a larger purchase, can you increase my limit so it goes through?
I tried to pay using Pay Later and it got declined; I think I need a higher limit.

description: User is confused between a PayPal refund and a bank chargeback for the same transaction.
example_user_utterances: I requested a refund and now my bank also opened a chargeback case – what should I do?
There’s a chargeback case and a refund at the same time for the same payment, I need help responding.

description: User received a damaged item and is requesting a partial refund/store credit.
example_user_utterances: The item arrived broken; can we just do a partial refund or store credit?
It’s damaged but I’ll accept a partial refund if that’s faster.

description: User received the wrong item and wants a full refund.
example_user_utterances: I got the wrong item entirely and I want a full refund.
They shipped the wrong product—please refund the full amount.

description: User sees an unexpected recurring charge and also wants to check refund status on it.
example_user_utterances: There’s a recurring charge I didn’t expect—was a refund started for it?
I just got charged again and I’m waiting on a refund, what’s the status?

description: New card cannot be added and checkout payments with that card are declined.
example_user_utterances: I can’t add my new card and even when I try to pay it gets declined.
Card won’t save to my wallet and checkout keeps failing with a decline.

description: Bank can’t be verified and send-money using that bank fails.
example_user_utterances: My bank won’t verify and sending money from it fails.
I’m stuck verifying my bank and transfers from it aren’t going through.

description: One transfer to bank failed and another withdrawal is stuck pending.
example_user_utterances: One transfer to my bank failed and the other is still pending.
My transfer error’d out and a different withdrawal is delayed.

description: Withdrawal was reversed and the account is also limited.
example_user_utterances: My withdrawal got reversed and now my account is limited.
The bank transfer was returned and my account shows a limitation.

description: A withdrawal is delayed and the account is limited under review.
example_user_utterances: My withdrawal is stuck pending and my account is limited.
Transfer is delayed and I see an account limitation notice.

description: Unauthorized payment plus signs of account compromise.
example_user_utterances: There’s an unauthorized charge and I think my account was compromised.
I didn’t make this payment and I’m seeing suspicious activity.

description: Unauthorized activity, suspected compromise, and user is locked out.
example_user_utterances: Someone made a payment, my account looks hacked, and I’m locked out.
I see an unauthorized charge, suspicious login, and now I can’t log in.

description: Address recently updated; checkout card decline likely due to AVS mismatch.
example_user_utterances: I updated my address and now my card is declined at checkout.
Changed my billing address, the card keeps failing with a mismatch.

description: Unexpected subscription charge and user wants to change the plan/tier.
example_user_utterances: I was charged the wrong subscription amount and need to change the plan.
Got an unexpected recurring charge and want to switch to a cheaper plan.
